Standard.Name: AudioText Play_spy_40700606: I can't believe I made that kind of beginner's mistakeâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700607: My plans have been thwarted!
AudioText Play_spy_40700608: I think I'll just leave before they lock me away!
AudioText Play_spy_40700609: I'm going to lie low until things quiet down.
AudioText Play_spy_40700800: Sparks are going to fly!
AudioText Play_spy_40700801: Now THAT is what I call fireworks!
AudioText Play_spy_40700802: I smell something burning!
AudioText Play_spy_40701100: What one careless match can doâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40701101: One second a gentle flame - a raging fire the next ...
AudioText Play_spy_40701102: <dangerous laugh> This town is going up in flames!
AudioText Play_spy_40701200: Made it! This hideout is perfect for our needs!
AudioText Play_spy_40701201: The perfect hideoutâ€¦ And now it's time to get down to business.
AudioText Play_spy_40701202: I'm all set up here!
AudioText Play_spy_40701300: It would probably be a very good idea to leave, now.
AudioText Play_spy_40701302: Never stay in one place too longâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40701500: I hope no one sees me slip in thereâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40702000: I know a girl who has mastered the Dance of the Seven Veils.
AudioText Play_spy_40702001: This belly dancer will empty the peoples' purses faster than the tax collectorâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40702002: When this belly dancer swings her hips, there's not a man alive who can say no.
AudioText Play_spy_40702300: Ha! There's not a purse in the world those curves can't open!
AudioText Play_spy_40702301: <laughs contentedly> That belly dancer just swings her hips and she's bathed in a shower of coinsâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40702302: Any man would be willing to pay to see the Dance of the Seven Veils.
AudioText Play_spy_40702600: I've prepared a very special speech for today!
AudioText Play_spy_40702601: These prophecies will make them forget everything else!
AudioText Play_spy_40702602: I guarantee no one will be working when I give my speech!
AudioText Play_spy_40702900: It'll be awhile before any of THOSE people go back to work!
AudioText Play_spy_40702901: Done! They're hanging on my every word!
AudioText Play_spy_40702902: <dangerous laugh> I've got them all wrapped around my finger!
AudioText Play_spy_40703800: Oh, won't they be in for a surprise the next time THEY draw water!
AudioText Play_spy_40703801: Soon the water here will be totally undrinkable!
AudioText Play_spy_40703802: That swill from the village well is easy to contaminate!
AudioText Play_spy_40704100: Look! The people are just wasting away!
AudioText Play_spy_40704101: The poison is working! The disease is starting to spread!
AudioText Play_spy_40704102: And done! A Medic would certainly have their hands full hereâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40704400: I know a sure-fire way to incite a mob!
AudioText Play_spy_40704401: You just have to give the people the right reason to revolt!
AudioText Play_spy_40704402: When I'm done with them, they'll be a raging mob!
AudioText Play_spy_40704700: Lovely! Soon the whole city will be in a state of emergency!
AudioText Play_spy_40704701: Just like I promised: the mob is rioting in the streets!
AudioText Play_spy_40704702: No one can stop them now!
AudioText Play_spy_40705500: I can feel it in my bones: something's going on around here!
AudioText Play_spy_40705501: Careful, now! Someone is plotting against you!
AudioText Play_spy_40705502: Look out! Enemy spies have infiltrated the area!
AudioText Play_spy_40705600: We were able to apprehend this scoundrel just in the nick of time!
AudioText Play_spy_40705601: Caught in the act! It's the dungeon for this one!
AudioText Play_spy_40705602: Just in time to prevent some thing much worse from happening!
AudioText Play_spy_40705700: This spy won't be troubling you any more!
AudioText Play_spy_40705701: A good thing I was able to take this scum out of circulation before he could cause any trouble!
AudioText Play_spy_40705702: This rascal thought he could bother you and get away scot-free!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250000: An enemy Henchman has been seen in your Settlement!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250001: An enemy Henchman is causing trouble in your Settlement!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250008: An opponent has caught your Henchman!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250009: Your Henchman has fallen into enemy hands!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250020: Your Henchman's Safe House now offers new possibilities!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250021: Your Henchman now has new possibilities at his command!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250022: One of your Henchmen now has new possibilities at his command!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250026: You lost a Safe House!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250027: An Arsonist has set fire to your Settlement!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250028: Your Settlement has been set afire!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250029: Someone has incited your Population to revolt!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250030: An opponent is urging your Population to revolt!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250031: A Well-poisoner has contaminated your Well!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250032: The water in your Well has been contaminated!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250033: A False Prophet is leading your Population astray!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250034: Your Population is falling under the sway of a False Prophet!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250035: A beguiling Belly Dancer is costing you Tax income!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250036: Your Population is wasting their money on a Belly Dancer!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250105: The location of an enemy Base of Operations has been revealed!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250108: The search for Bases of Operations produced no results!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250109: Your Agent has unable to uncover any enemy Bases of Operations!
AudioText Play_spy_40700000: So you found your way into the shadows...
AudioText Play_spy_40700001: Arson? Sabotage? What'll it be?
AudioText Play_spy_40700002: <dangerous laugh> I've been expecting you.
AudioText Play_spy_40700003: Sooner or later they all come to meâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700004: So you want me to do your dirty workâ€¦ <dangerous laugh>
AudioText Play_spy_40700100: Where I grew up, theft and murder were the order of the dayâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700101: My loyalty is yours, and yours alone - as long as you pay me well.
AudioText Play_spy_40700102: I am a creature of darkness. Wherever there is a shadow, I am close - very close.
AudioText Play_spy_40700200: As good as doneâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700201: I'll look after it.
AudioText Play_spy_40700204: Just leave the matter to meâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700300: We must be patient, you and Iâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700301: Something like this needs to be well-plannedâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700302: Softly, milord, softly - everything is going exactly as plannedâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700303: Soon, now, very soonâ€¦
AudioText Play_spy_40700304: We dare not rush things ...
AudioText Play_spy_40700501: Everything went exactly according to plan - as always.
AudioText Play_spy_40700600: Damn! They caught me!
AudioText Play_spy_40700601: My cover is blown!
AudioText Play_spy_40700602: I have to disappear!
AudioText Play_spy_40700603: Curses! They've foiled my plan!
AudioText Play_spy_40700604: I have to get out of here before they arrest me!
AudioText Play_spy_40700605: They squeezed me like a ripe fruit.
